meanings.sent1: The pulpwood was gathered for paper production.
meanings.sent2: The factory needed more pulpwood to make paper.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the pulpwood to build a tiny fort.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were written on pulpwood, ready to be transformed into stories.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh pulpwood filled the air in the forest.

meanings.definition: The material used in making paper.
meanings.sent1: They imported pulpwood to create newspapers.
meanings.sent2: Recycling pulpwood helps in reducing paper waste.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat made of pulpwood.
meanings.sent4: His words were printed on pulpwood, spreading knowledge far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted vibrant scenes on pulpwood canvases.
